Body:
async def handler_callback(server, ident, msg):
    raise Exception
async with conn_req(handler_dict={io.Action: handler_callback}) as socket:
    await assertReplyReq(socket, io.Action(0, io.INPUT_FLOATING), ack.
        FAILED_COMMAND)
records = [record for record in caplog.records if record.levelno >= logging
    .WARNING]
assert len(records
    ) == 1 and 'Uncaught exception in command handler' in records[0].message
check_caplog.expected.update(records)
pytest.mark.trio
